Uses of Interface
org.phantomapi.construct.Controllable

  • Packages that use Controllable 
    Package Description
    org.phantomapi
    Contains the base Phantom class which is very useful
    org.phantomapi.clust
    Contains a rubust, powerful configuration and key value data storage system
    org.phantomapi.command
    Contains a command system built on it's own for ease of use
    org.phantomapi.construct
    Used for constructing structured plugins
    org.phantomapi.core
    The core set of controllers phantom uses to host the framework
    org.phantomapi.event
    Events phantom has added to bukkits event system
    org.phantomapi.game
    Full game api system
    org.phantomapi.registry
    Registries for effects and artifacts, along with schematics and banks
    org.phantomapi.sync
    Sync tasking and executive iterators including aggresive handovers
    org.phantomapi.util
    The most useful package.
    org.phantomapi.wraith
    Wraith npc's for simple or advanced interaction with players
